text: Egha a ua kamaghɨn na mɨgei, “O nguazir kamɨn gumazim, nɨ oragh! Kɨ Jerusalemɨn daghebar amightɨ da bar otevegham. Eghtɨ gumazamiziba atiatim sara, aruer vamɨrara men tughatɨghamin damamin daghebara ikiam. Eghtɨ gumazamizibar dɨpabar daghem, kɨ anetughtɨ, me arueba vaghvagh dughiar vamɨran dɨpam amɨ bar osemegham.
